title: Was it a black man accused of murdering a 5-year-old white man in North Carolina?
subtitle: The conservative Americans claimed that the main media (except Fox News) planned to keep Cannon Hennant dead.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: A black man in North Carolina was charged with the murder of Canon Hannant, a 5-year-old white boy, and with the exception of Fox News, the main media deliberately ignored this to promote a predetermined racist narrative.
